name: @augmint/js
keywords: augmint javascript library A-EUR stablecoin web3 dapp
author: Augmint

scripts.test: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src yarn mocha 'src/**/*.test.js' --exit
scripts.ganache:start: docker start ganache || docker run --name ganache -p 8545:8545 augmint/contracts:v1.0.4 --db ./dockerLocalchaindb --gasLimit 0x47D5DE --gasPrice 1000000000 --networkId 999 -m "hello build tongue rack parade express shine salute glare rate spice stock"
